jd: From: Harsh Tiwari, Technocraft solutions harsh.tiwari@technocraftsol.com Reply to: harsh.tiwari@technocraftsol.com Job Title: Java/angular developers (Only Locals)Job ID: 749891 (Hybrid)Location: Richmond, VA (VDOT)Duration: 7 MonthsThis position requires that the resource works onsite 2 -3 days a week or as needed. Skills:Experience with Java, J2EE Architecture, JSP, Servlets, JDBC Required 8 YearsExperience with PL/SQL, MSSQL Programming Required 6 YearsExperience with front end technologies using Angular Required 4 YearsExperience with Eclipse, Tomcat Required 6 YearsExperience with Agile SDLC best practices Required 6 YearsExperience with Azure DevOps or similar for code management and CI/CD pipeline Required 6 YearsExperience with C#/.NET Desired 3 Years Description:This position requires that the resource works onsite 2 -3 days a week or as needed. VDOT is looking for experienced Java/angular developers with 8 + years’ experience in IT. •Experience with Java, J2EE architecture, JSP, Servlets, XML, JSON, XSL , SQL, PL/SQL, JDBC, OO Design, CSS, HTML, AJAX, eclipse, Tomcat, JavaScript and knowledgeable with the Windows platform.• Ability to design and code using modern day frameworks such as Angular, Typescript and other web-related technologies.•Experience with .Net and C# is a huge plus.•Experience with relational database design and development with Oracle and MSSQL•Experience in software design, development, and testing of web-based software applications•Strong conceptual, analytical, and problem-solving abilities•Strong interpersonal and written/verbal communication skills
